title: Day 10: Hagar and Ishmael (2022)
author: Ascension
itunes:author: Ascension
itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike reads Genesis 20-21, Job 9-10, and Proverbs 2:6-8 and shows us how we can strive for holiness, even in the midst of sin and suffering.
